class.name: PlaceholderVoxelGIData
class.description: This class is used when loading a project that uses a [VoxelGIData] subclass, if the project was exported in dedicated server mode. In this mode, only the resource reference is kept, with no actual voxel data. This allows reducing the exported PCK's size significantly. [b]Note:[/b] This is not intended to be used as an actual resource for rendering.
